Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at 54th/Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at 54th/Cermak due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
